Title: Relates to villages with November elections conducting referenda
Summary: Provides that for villages that hold their general election on the general election day in November, if such petition be filed on or after the first day of June and on or before the first day of August, a proposition for the approval of such act or resolution shall be submitted at the general village election date in November of that year; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the village law, in relation to villages with November elections conducting referenda
